hiveArticle.title: Weekly Steem Stats Report - July 24, 2017
hiveArticle.body:
Welcome to my Steem Stats Report for Monday, July 24, 2017. All data is coming directly from the Steem blockchain and is based on UTC time.

*The format of the date fields is 'YYYYWW'.
I.e. 201729 is week 29 of 2017 (from July 17 to July 23).*

## 1. Weekly number of Posts (including comments)
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTKGpTasX51AWbwjoUBxbPbjThNLNNh9QiQaUvtTkjwN1/image.png)
Date | Posts
--- | ---
201729 | 735,617
201728 | 806,891
201727 | 852,571
201726 | 976,399
201725 | 808,004
201724 | 572,741
201723 | 428,461


<center>https://steemitimages.com/DQmbNxNgXLda5QXpWfDZxP2d3XR498RxCgucZVMnrBVcw7g/image.png</center>
## 2. Weekly number of votes
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbjjHPd64mhY3TLJksrXgDMdTQMkFuAX2wQhQJSeGTWKm/image.png)
Date | Votes
--- | ---
201729 | 2,077,547
201728 | 2,127,795
201727 | 1,937,757
201726 | 1,910,964
201725 | 1,904,070
201724 | 1,733,898
201723 | 1,422,894


<center>https://steemitimages.com/DQmbNxNgXLda5QXpWfDZxP2d3XR498RxCgucZVMnrBVcw7g/image.png</center>

201729 | 43,617
201728 | 44,583
201727 | 41,424
201726 | 40,760
201725 | 34,553
201724 | 26,166
201723 | 19,811


<center>https://steemitimages.com/DQmbNxNgXLda5QXpWfDZxP2d3XR498RxCgucZVMnrBVcw7g/image.png</center>

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbY5JFtatKFK3mXsDCk2FMDPXE13Y9DCf27J159AzXcg9/image.png)
Date | Average # comments
--- | ---
201729 | 3.51
201728 | 3.54
201727 | 3.58
201726 | 3.65
201725 | 3.62
201724 | 3.74
201723 | 3.67


<center>https://steemitimages.com/DQmbNxNgXLda5QXpWfDZxP2d3XR498RxCgucZVMnrBVcw7g/image.png</center>
## 5. New accounts created

Date | New Accounts
--- | ---
201729 | 12,728
201728 | 14,156
201727 | 10,698
201726 | 17,353
201725 | 17,322
201724 | 19,072
201723 | 6,985


<center>https://steemitimages.com/DQmbNxNgXLda5QXpWfDZxP2d3XR498RxCgucZVMnrBVcw7g/image.png</center>
## 6. Weekly Amount of SBD converted to Steem
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTmbCWWTyj81sMWvSBXL22AMWtRQJK5se5LzQDGo3oxUq/image.png)
Date | Amount in SBD

201728 | 53,547.834 SBD

201726 | 20,851.761 SBD
201725 | 14,021.673 SBD

## 7. Weekly Amount of Steem Powered UP & DOWN
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXyEX52qTFCevxAxqawqWuLWewrSfE7ySLfjuJecYxzYy/image.png)
Date | Powered UP | Powered DOWN | Difference
--- | ---
201729 | 3,230,324 STEEM | 1,595,833 STEEM | 1,634,491 STEEM
201728 | 1,806,991 STEEM | 1,726,677 STEEM | 80,314 STEEM
201727 | 1,784,699 STEEM | 1,967,021 STEEM | -182,322 STEEM
Average p/d | 2,274,005 STEEM | 1,763,177 STEEM | 510,828 STEEM


<center>https://steemitimages.com/DQmbNxNgXLda5QXpWfDZxP2d3XR498RxCgucZVMnrBVcw7g/image.png</center>
## 8. Weekly Steem & SBD Transfers

Date | Steem | SBD

201729 | 4,882,936.491 STEEM | 733,431.355 SBD

201725 | 3,655,019.450 STEEM | 465,504.810 SBD
201724 | 6,143,653.407 STEEM | 467,103.596 SBD
201723 | 12,240,053.631 STEEM | 388,531.815 SBD


<center>https://steemitimages.com/DQmbNxNgXLda5QXpWfDZxP2d3XR498RxCgucZVMnrBVcw7g/image.png</center>
## 9. Steem Price Update
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmX4iRLwDbBm97pdMi7YCtGQuaYg1cdgnDDiKxL1SVxTXt/image.png)
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUbq564nLJ8iMkV8WpdThDcjoxHrT5qFXTFVThp1JAiET/image.png)

<center><sub>¯\\___(ツ)____/¯ *Follow me @penguinpablo for daily Steem statistics.*</sub></center>
